alert.note: Alert for Marion (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 07 at 8:23AM CDT until September 08 at 2:56AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Columbia affecting Marion County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Pearl River Near Columbia. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 17.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this morning and continue falling to 4.6 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Pearl River Columbia 17.0 17.3 Wed 7 am CDT 13.3 8.5 5.8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 8 PM CDT.
